title: Back To Top Button
markdownDescription:
https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-developer-docs/docs/vtex-store-components-backtotopbutton

`back-to-top-button` is a store block exported by the Store Components app that redirects users to the top of the page when clicked on.

`"vtex.store-components@3.x"`

props.markdownDescription: All available properties for this block.

displayThreshold.markdownDescription:
`number`

Defines the window Y pixel in which the button will be displayed.

oneOf.markdownDescription: Displays a button with a `Back To Top` label text
